page.title: 12Tourism-Beamish
page.content: {The Colliery { A feature at Beamish is the Drift mine which has been developed at the site of an original colliery.At the colliery there is a steam winder,a street of pit cottages complete with burning coal fires and the drift mine itself which has given visitors the opportunity to enter and see the workings for themselves. Visitors are taken into the 'drift' in coal trucks and ,wearing their pit helmets,allowed to come face to face with the coal face! The most frequent visitors to the drift mine are ex and working miners!
